title: Menacing Attack
content:
Passive in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.

Menacing Attack Information

Spend a superiority die to make an attack that deals an additional 1d8 damage and possibly Frightens the target.
